channel.title: The Poanizer Project 667 eco
channel.description:
[U][B][SIZE=5]The Poanizer Project [/SIZE][/B] [/U]
[B]Website: [/B][url=http://www.poanizer.com/]The Poanizer Project[/url]
[B]Forum: [/B] [url=http://www.poanizer.com/forums/forum.php]Poanizer Project Forum[/url]
[B]Webclient: [/B][url=http://www.poanizer.com/webclient.html]http://www.poanizer.com/webclient.html.[/url]
[B]Client: [/B][URL=http://"http://www.poanizer.com/PoProject.jar"]http://poanizer.com/PoProject.jar[/URL]
The Poanizer Project is a Server I made to test some skills on but its now a functioning server with player count and economy.
It has everything any other typical server has, with a few extras. Its based of an Extinction V2 source, but isnt a leech dont worry. Its been edited a lot from then as well.
[B]If you were looking to read a fairly long boring list of what we have then heres some of it. [/B]
[ul][*]Skilling (all skills) [*] Pvm [*] Pking [*]Safe Pvp [*]Clan wars [*]Castle wars [*]Warriors Guild [*]Custom Bosses. [*]Custom Items. [*]Pvm Kill Count list [*]Self kill counter function (Counts each kill till you reset/stop it) [*]enable/disable features (like semi pointless login messages) [*]IpLock System (like J.A.G) [*]Plenty of Account Security (2 Hourly Backup, Antihacks) [*]Pretty good community. [*]Regular Updates ([url=http://goo.gl/8klSE1]Updates[/url]) [*]Average Forums. [*]Ingame player count on forums. [*]Most known 667 bugs Fixed [*]Donator Benefits. [*]Charm Collector ring.(Dont need to pick up charms) [*]Customization for your character to an extent at the moment. [*]Auto vote [*]Dicing/Flowers [*]Working Pets [*]Bank Tabs [*]And just all the normal[/ul]
[B]Or look at the media below [/B]
[SPOILER=Media]
[B]Home[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/home_zps5c1427b6.png[/img]
[B]Shops[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/shops_zps6b5fe2d5.png[/img]
[B]Custom CLient Loading Wheel/BG/Icon[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/client_zpscd466ca8.png[/img]
[B]PvM Kill Counter[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/pvm-kills_zps46029ff0.png[/img]
[B]Comp' Cape Requirments[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/comp_zps4a873ae7.png[/img]
[B]Working Pets[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/pets_zps804202ec.png[/img]
[B]Custom Kalphite King[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/kking_zps3bb6e862.png[/img]
[B]Donatorzone + Boss[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/po1_zpse7819bdd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/po2_zpsb4a6c4c5.png[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/2_zps34ecd20e.png[/img]
[B]Castle Wars[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/castle-wars_zpsb91b8512.png[/img]
[B]An interface to enable/disable the features. Almost any feature will be added if people find it annoying.[/B]
[IMG]http://i694.photobucket.com/albums/vv307/kittenpo/enables_zps9a98653a.png[/img]
[B]An IP Account Locking system, like the Jagex Account Gaurdian, but for RSPS.[/B] [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/2w35n4x.jpg[/img]
[B]Something which may be seen as not that special, but an auto updated ingame player list on forums.[/B]
[IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/987fgo.jpg[/img]
[B]Working Flowers and Purple Sweets. [/B]
[IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/33kd9x4.jpg[/img]
[B]Some old armour looks. [/B]
[IMG]http://oi61.tinypic.com/2lbdfrr.jpg[/img]
[B][SIZE=3]Oh and remember.............[/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://oi58.tinypic.com/x3d25h.jpgg[/img][/SPOILER]
[SIZE=4][B]A video showing most of whats on there.[/B][/SIZE]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yl2mZg-blUE]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yl2mZg-blUE[/url]
[SIZE=4][B]Or a Video on like 3/30 ish things on this list?[/B][/SIZE]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dp64cwfE9WE]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dp64cwfE9WE[/url]

item.title: The Poanizer Project 667 eco
item.dc:creator: @Rikay Rikay
item.description:
@Rikay wrote:

I don’t like it. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: The Poanizer Project 667 eco
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

First thing I noticed was that Edgeville already looks way too cluttered and is filled with NPCs that probably have an infinite amount of decent items, which is going to destroy your economy.

Create custom zoned training spaces located near edgeville. You have the mountain to the west, open field to the east, potentially “risky yet worthy” training spots to the north which could have an increase in rare drops, and the barbarian village, Gertrude’s House (Which would be great for a roleplay bandit home or some sort), and much more. [B]REMEMBER[/B] the monsters you can use are not limited to the popular/generics that already exist (shitty rock crabs, etc.) changing level, stat, and loot variables in decently modeled NPCs isn’t overly complicated from what I understand. I would be a lot more impressed to see low leveled ice warriors, maybe ice fiends, and other themed monsters that are lower leveled, than the shitty/horribly modeled rock crabs that people are so lazy about.

Your server has potential, but you need to own the server and put basic amounts of work to keep your economy alive and stable. Another tip is to not douse your server in GP. Create ways in which gp can be removed from the game without overpowering NPC traders. Things like the lottery, bond trading for “donator items” (EX: 1 million gp = 1 donator bond) which can be used at spawn to trade for something decent/cosmetic). Or something like using donator bonds for temporary access to donator locations/exp boosts.

If you want eco then you need to choose a reasonable exp rate. I would not suggest anything 50x or higher.

Read full topic

item.title: The Poanizer Project 667 eco
item.dc:creator: @poanizer poanizer
item.description:
@poanizer wrote:

[quote=“liamp, post:4, topic:543142”]maybe you should get someone to make you a better interface for this one because it doesn’t appeal to me at all anyway good luck.

[/quote]

Whys that? What dont you like about it? I just found it when browsing and thought it would work. each ones a button.

item.title: The Poanizer Project 667 eco
item.dc:creator: @poanizer poanizer
item.description:
@poanizer wrote:

Yea good point, I just never thought people really cared about donator benefits.

Basically the usual just edited a bit

Donatorzone
"Donator only" items.
+1 items on death
Slightly better agility Xp.
Boss that drops good items.

Read full topic

item.title: The Poanizer Project 667 eco
item.dc:creator: @Ykcud Ykcud
item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

It would be nice to know what the “Donator Benefits” are. I know you are far from being the only person to put it as one of your features but it helps a lot to list these perks instead of just “Donator Benefits”. Am I the only one to feel this way? Good luck with your server. I am going to go on to find out what these features are.

Read full topic
